title: Why Women's Lives Don't Matter: ignoring sexual violence in conflict
itunes:author: Surood Mohammed Falih, Pramila Patten, Robinah Rubimbwa
description: Contributor(s): Surood Mohammed Falih, Pramila Patten, Robinah Rubimbwa | A nine-year-old girl is sold to a 50-year-old man for $2000. This is Afghanistan today. But it was Iraq a few years ago, and Uganda before that. The horror of sexual violence that threatens the lives of girls and women, as well as many boys and men in today’s wars, is no longer an unknown.
